name: DailyLessonsbyPIQLiving
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Daily Lessons by PIQ Living. Adding to your daily Flash Briefing will give you a great boost each day with a quick quote and lesson that you can use to improve your outcomes in life.

With 365 quotes and life lessons, you will receive simple ways to be better and happier throughout your everyday life.

PIQ Living is a global mentoring organization whose primary goal is to bring inspiration and beneficial change to the lives of those who seek to improve their surroundings and support.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
